title: Design Thinking and Project-Based Entrepreneurship Education: Blended Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and general understanding of entrepreneurship
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for current practitioners to strengthen science-based entrepreneurial competencies. Provides a blended online-offline learning environment using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can derive entrepreneurial ideas to solve social issues in science using design thinking methodology.
Learners can plan real-world science entrepreneurship scenarios and propose viable business models through project-based blended learning.
Learners can develop prototypes of entrepreneurial projects and complete presentation materials through team-based collaboration.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
